<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the condition without hint bits.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
